## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT1G02840](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT1G02840)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>At-SR34, ATSRP34, SR1, SR34, SRP34</u>
- **Gene Name:** Serine/Arginine-Rich Protein Splicing Factor 34, Serine/Arginine-Rich Protein Splicing Factor 34
- **Description:**   RNA-binding (RRM/RBD/RNP motifs) family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
